text:
parameters are not GET nor POST after the first iteration of a thread group.
starting the test after the test completes works fine, but not if the thread 
is running multiple iterations.
creator: sys@yahoo.com
mstover1@apache.org
text: I'd have been truly worried if this were so.  It worked fine for me.

Ah, I found what you were referring to, I think.  When using an HTTP Defaults
object, arguments were getting attached to samplers only on the first iteration.
 I have fixed this problem today.
creator: mstover1@apache.org
